name: astrofy
description: Astrofy is a free and open-source template for your Personal Portfolio Website built with Astro and TailwindCSS. Create in minutes a website with Blog, CV, Project Section, Store and RSS Feed.

scripts.convert-docs: echo 'Converting documents to DOCX and PDF...' && pandoc ./src/content/blog/post1.md -o ./public/nanny-work-agreement.docx && pandoc ./src/content/blog/post1.md -o ./public/nanny-work-agreement.pdf --pdf-engine=weasyprint && sed -e 's|src="/profile.webp"|src="public/profile.webp"|g' -e 's|src="/.netlify/images/|src=".netlify/images/|g' ./dist/cv/index.html > /tmp/cv-fixed.html && pandoc /tmp/cv-fixed.html -o ./public/carmelina-ayala-cv.docx && pandoc /tmp/cv-fixed.html -o ./public/carmelina-ayala-cv.pdf --pdf-engine=weasyprint --css=src/styles/print-cv.css && rm -f /tmp/cv-fixed.html
